crochet hook i-9 5 5mm pins for marking gauge 12 dcs and 6 5 row in pattern = 4 this generous hood starts at the top of the head and is worked to the neck where a scarf grows out of a mini shaped yoke chain 29 insert hook into the second chain from the hook and single_crochet to the end do not turn but continue on the other side of the chain and single_crochet to the end chain 2 and turn row 1 double_crochet in each single_crochet to the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet to the end of the row chain 2 and turn repeat row 2 until hood measures 9 from stitches chain 2 and turn double_crochet in each stitch to the end chain 1 and turn second decreasing row * 4 scs decrease1 stitch in the next 2 stitches repeat from * to the end of the row working scs in any remaining stitches fasten_off fold the hood in half and place a pin at the center back noting that there are the same number of stitches on either side of the pin if there is an odd number
